DESCRIPTION: Create a new tournament in your server so people can RSVP.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}tournamentcreate** ~ Creates a brand new tournament using the default template.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}tournamentcreate [Template Name]** ~ Creates an tournament from an existing template.
CREATE_SUCCESS: You have successfully created a new tournament on this server with an ID of **[ {{number}} ]**.
